definition: General Scholastic Ability Test (college entrance exam in Taiwan)
pinyin: Da4 xue2 Xue2 ke1 Neng2 li4 Ce4 yan4
fei1 ci2 chong2 fu4 ce4 yan4

definition: physical fitness test (for school students etc)
pinyin: ti3 yu4 da2 biao1 ce4 yan4

sentences.english: Aural tests are objective and can be graded mechanically.
sentences.chinese: 听力测验是客观的，可以机械地评分。

sentences.english: I succeeded in passing the driving test.
sentences.chinese: 我乐成地经过了驾驶测验。

sentences.english: Robert put the new employees through a series of tests.
sentences.chinese: 罗勃让新进员工进行了一系列的测验。

sentences.english: At Levels 5 and 6, the Vocabulary test measures listening vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 在第五和第六级，单字测验是以听力为主。

sentences.english: You got a l5 out of 15 on your Part 1 idiom quiz!
sentences.chinese: 你在第一部分十五道成语测验题中答对了五道。

sentences.english: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. 2. Brick quiz whangs veldt fox.
sentences.chinese: 关于砖头的测验把一只跳跃的草原狐狸给难住了。

sentences.english: I have quizzes and tests all the time.
This parameter is calculated by first dividing learners into thirds based on the overall score in the quiz.
sentences.chinese: 首先根据测验的总成绩将学习者分成三组来测算母数。

sentences.english: Philip is a phenomenon in math. He always gets 100% on tests.
sentences.chinese: 非利普是个数学天才，他总是在测验时获满分。

sentences.english: This section contains the review and actual quiz materials for the course.
sentences.chinese: 此部分包括课程复习资料和测验的全真试题。
你以高分通过数学测验。
明天我们要以作业2为基础进行第二次测验。

sentences.english: The effectiveness of the rider's aids determines the precise fulfilment of the required movements of the tests.
sentences.chinese: 骑手扶助的效率，决定执行测验中的动作的精准度。

sentences.english: During my Number 2 month of nursing educate, we professor gave us a pop quiz.
sentences.chinese: 上护校的第二个月，教授给咱们来了个突袭测验。

sentences.english: This article, thus, represents an initial attempt to do just that.
sentences.chinese: 因而，本文关于这点停止初度测验考试。

definition: to examine/to check up on/to assess/to review/appraisal/review/evaluation
a test/determination/to check up on/to examine/to assay
to draw up the theme (for discussion)
